EmailTemplate.name: 09-23-21 BNK Connect Webinar Series Invitation.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Register! [Webinar] AI’s role in the future of digital-first banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Digital banking experiences need to be engaging, friction-free, insightful and intelligent. Yet uncertainty remains on how best to achieve this. Join our CONNECT webinar series for an in-depth discussion about the role of AI, predicted industry trends and what it takes to execute a successful AI strategy for digital-first banking. When: Tuesday, September 28 at 2 p.m. EST, register with code: NCR928. What to expect: We’re bringing together an expert panel, including Doug Brown from NCR, Zor Gorelov from Kasisto and Mark Schwanhausser from Javelin Strategy & Research. Together they’ll cover: - The tools, services and resources needed for AI to be successful in digital banking - What a successful AI strategy for digital-first banking looks like - Why AI isn’t as complicated as some industry leaders make it out to be - How financial services providers have shifted to AI-driven solutions ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Register with code: NCR928 See you there, The NCR Banking Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
